#summary UtilLite++

= Introduction =

This c++ library includes cross-platform (Windows, Linux, Mac) useful utilities :
 * multi-threading (+safe inter-thread communication), 
 * logging, 
 * timing,
for fast prototyping.

If you use Qt, UtilLite++ includes easy to use simple Widgets to plot in real-time some statistics, changing algorithm parameters on runtime safely.
